ABOUT_SECTION.TITLE: About me
ABOUT_SECTION.PARAGRAPH1: Hey there, I'm Alex! Technology and innovation have always been my passion. My journey in IT is driven by a deep curiosity to solve complex problems through code. I love the challenge of finding efficient, elegant solutions and continuously refining my skills to stay ahead in the ever-evolving tech world. What inspires me the most is the ability to turn ideas into reality—building applications that make a difference. Every project is an opportunity to learn, grow, and push boundaries.
ABOUT_SECTION.PARAGRAPH2: Let's collaborate and build something remarkable together!

SKILL_SET.DESCRIPTION: I'm proficient in front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, and Angular. At the same time, I'm highly adaptable and constantly exploring new tools, frameworks, and programming approaches to stay ahead of industry trends.

PROJECTS.PROJECTS_P: Discover my innovative projects and see how I blend responsive design with efficient code to create user-friendly experiences. Each project reflects my commitment to pushing boundaries and delivering outstanding digital solutions. Dive in, explore the creative work I’ve built, and let your curiosity lead you to something extraordinary!
PROJECTS.JOIN: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories
PROJECTS.EL_POLLO_LOCO: Jump, run and throw game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
PROJECTS.DABUBBLE: This app is a Slack clone that revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.

COLLEAGUES.CARD_TEXT1: Alex has a clear sense of direction and knows how to keep the team focused. His ability to encourage everyone to do their best helped us achieve solid results.
COLLEAGUES.CARD_TEXT2: Working with Alex was motivating. He brings good energy to the team, listens to different opinions, and makes brainstorming sessions more productive.
COLLEAGUES.CARD_TEXT3: Alex is reliable and supportive. He offers practical suggestions and ensures the team stays on track without unnecessary pressure.

PROJECT_DETAILS.JOIN_DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
PROJECT_DETAILS.JOIN_DETAILS: For Project Join, I developed a structured workflow by designing and refining a Kanban board to streamline task management and boost team productivity. I set clear priorities, monitored progress transparently, and continuously optimized the process, showcasing my ability to work independently and adapt to evolving project needs.
PROJECT_DETAILS.POLLO_DESCRIPTION: Jump, run and throw game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
PROJECT_DETAILS.POLLO_DETAILS: In Project El Pollo Loco, I led the game development process from concept to final execution. Utilizing agile methodologies, I iteratively refined game mechanics and user experience while maintaining rigorous quality standards. This project highlights my self-driven, structured approach to creative and technical challenges.
PROJECT_DETAILS.DABUBBLE_DESCRIPTION: With this Pokédex, you can browse an expanding list of Pokémon, explore their types and stats, and view details in a clean card layout. Save your favorites and choose how many Pokémon to load – they’ll still be there on your next visit.
PROJECT_DETAILS.DABUBBLE_DETAILS: This project was my first hands-on experience with an API. I used the PokeAPI to work with large datasets. Parsing and structuring the data was challenging at first, but as I got the hang of it, integrating the information into the frontend became really enjoyable.

CONTACT.P-1: I’m excited to collaborate and turn ideas into reality. With growing front-end experience and astrong drive to improve, I bring both creativity and reliability to the team. Always eager to learn, I’m ready to take on new challenges and deliver meaningful results.
CONTACT.P-2: Passionate about front-end development and eager to grow, I’m ready to bring fresh ideas and energy to your team. Let’s build something impactful together!
